mapper.select: select t1.id , t1.fk_report_id , t1.asset_disposal , t1.compensate , t1.intro , t1.create_time , t1.modify_time , t1.validate_state , t1.create_by , t1.update_by from ext_wl_sh_credit_record_intro t1 where t1.id = #{id}
mapper.update: update ext_wl_sh_credit_record_intro t1 set t1.fk_report_id =#{dto.fkReportId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, t1.asset_disposal =#{dto.assetDisposal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.compensate =#{dto.compensate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.intro =#{dto.intro,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.create_time =#{dto.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, t1.modify_time =#{dto.modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, t1.validate_state ='1', t1.create_by =#{dto.createBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, t1.update_by =#{dto.updateBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where t1.id = #{dto.id}
mapper.delete: delete from ext_wl_sh_credit_record_intro t1 where t1.ID in (${ids} )
mapper.update: update ext_wl_sh_credit_record_intro t1 set t1.validate_state='0' where t1.id in( ${ids})
